amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the fire grant and SAFER programs by $111 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Fire Grant and Safer Program by $112 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sabo amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Sabo.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sabo amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
